segments.text: It's interesting to view the calm garden through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path, the bushes, the fenceâ€”all so serene and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It stands in such sharp contrast to the unfolding chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find a strange peace looking out at that tranquil scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wish the interior of this kitchen could be as peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water keeps running, steadily creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are still engaged in their daring quest for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world seems completely unaware of the domestic drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark reminder of how quickly order can dissolve.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I appreciate the neatness of the garden even more now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a beautiful day outside, yet filled with such neglect inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast really emphasizes the impending accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
